Company: ARACO POULTRY & LIVESTOCK CORP.
Job Description: Job Responsibilities: Knows how to operate greenhouses and improve the health of the livestock and maintain research, field and chemical application equipment. Need to be able to operate vehicles or other motorized equipment and should have knowledge of procedures used in farming and land preparations. Physical labor in addition to writing reports that accurately record information conducted from their research and operations. They may set up the feeding and crops on a range as well as maintain their inventory levels through purchasing chemicals, food and supplies required for use their work. It is often necessary for them to be able to sterilize and clean equipment used in labs for the tests that they conduct. Job Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in agriculture, animal science, or equivalent. Additional courses in business management or administration are recommended. Extensive experience in a farming-related field. Management experience would be a plus. A passion for agriculture.

Company: Healthy Options
Job Description: Healthy Options is looking for a Production Officer for Honest Farms, our organic farm business division. The major tasks, duties, and responsibilities to be performed are as follows: Planning and organizing farm processing, packing and store delivery schedules Lead the farm production team to receive and check all produce (including eggs) deliveries Prepare periodic reports to update upper management on farm production activities Create work shifts to ensure round-the-clock farm production operations Maintain accurate inventory of raw materials and processed farm products Ensure all products are stored properly at optimum conditions avoiding wastage Liaising with buyers, Catman, marketing and sales teams Conduct studies to discover ways to improve the efficiency of production processes Oversee the training of farm production personnel Monitor every aspect of receiving, processing and packing to ensure compliance with established procedures and QA standards Ensure processing staff wear proper sanitary & protective gear to ensure health and safety Oversee the maintenance and repair of equipment to ensure smooth work operations Ensure all company regulations and government legislations are adhered to Attend seminars, conferences, and educational programs to update job knowledge. Why Join Us? Be part of Asiaâ€™s largest all-natural product retailer for 25 years! Enjoy our aesthetic and employee â€“friendly stores/office, with cute office pets in our HQ. Experience on-the-job skill development and mentoring program. Learn from our in-house and external trainings. Grow and challenge yourself to join our leadership development program. Work in a Company that values an entrepreneurial mindset on the job. Feel secure in our above industry compensation package. Join an organization that has a high retention rate, where people love where they work.

Develop effective PPT materials per product, tailor made for defined audience â€“ layer farm; broiler farm, piggery farm3. Formulate Feeds as per request from Sales Rep / target clients4. Develop Technical Tools , brochures, dialogues as tools for Sales RepresentativesPer product per target market6. Be able to formulate and implement effective Marketing Plan7. Regularly monitor market prices including local selling prices.8. Regularly gathers updates on competitor activities, market share (per client), and other related information.9. Understanding Competition and its products. Collate competitor materials, brochures, and product samples.10. Attend industry exhibits and fora to gather market information, strengthen client relationship, widen client scope, and determine potential customers. B. DISTRIBUTOR ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT 1. Formulate and Implement effective Technical Support for Distributors â€“ in coordination with Sales Rep at the area2. Develops a feasible marketing plan that will support Inozaâ€™s sales objectives. C. TECHNICAL FUNCTION 1. Regularly equip himself on Technical updates of products being handled such as required documents (MSDS, QS, product brochures)2. Regularly review and evaluate products of principals and the Inoza Blend vitamin and mineral premix formulations submitted by clients.3. Design TRIAL Protocols for Products â€“ product development and testing4. Aim to develop Inozaâ€™s Products as clientâ€™s â€œTop of the Mindâ€ by adding value in the business through:a. product presentationsb. technical servicesc. technical seminarsd. product trials D. KEY ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT 1. Formulate and Implement effective Key Account Plan / Management2. Establish relationship with the primary decision makers (President, CEO, Executive Body, Team Leaders â€“ Technical, Purchasing, QA, etc.) and secondary decision makers (secretary, clerks)3. Consistently gathers information on clientâ€™s plans, policies, and other related activities (expansions, re-organizations, etc)4. Develops partnership with key clients through product development and technical services.5. Develops Action Plans that will maintain old clients; and create and develop new clients.

Company: Marsman Estate Plantation, Inc. - Davao
Job Description: Role Profile: The Director for Production is responsible for providing direction and control of the overall operations of banana production particularly fruit care and farm utility services (fertilization and weed control). S/he is also responsible in ensuring that the company produces substantial high-quality bananas that meet market demands in the most efficient and cost-effective way. Lastly, the incumbent must ensure that the company operates within prescribed production controls, standards, procedures and efficiency to meets goals and targets. Position Specifications: Educational Qualification: Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Agriculture Experience Required: 10 years of experience in farm management and banana production in a Director-Level role Competencies Required: Knowledge: Banana field activities, farm implements, managing farms and people Skills: Problem-solving, with foresight, leading, controlling, delegating, excellent oral and written communications, analytical, computer application Attributes/Behavior: High level of work values and ethics, firm, objective in looking at things, strategic Required language(s): English, Filipino and preferably Visayan Preferably CEO/SVP/AVP/VP/Director specialized in Agriculture or equivalent.

Company: Leong Hup (Philippines) Inc.
Job Description: The candidate must be a Licensed Veterinarian with Valid PRC ID with following job descriptions; 1. Animal Health - prevent disease and treat flock in cases of disease. Including administer/compute vaccine and medicine requirements. 2. Biosecurity - enforce Biosecurity protocol in farm. 3. Comply with government (BAI) protocols, permits. 4. Animal welfare - comply with animal welfare standards imposed by government. 5. Learn management of flocks. Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's/College Degree, Professional License (Passed Board/Bar/Professional License Exam) in Agriculture/Aquaculture/Forestry, Veterinary or equivalent. Required language(s): Filipino, English At least 3 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Preferably Supervisor/5 Yrs & Up Experienced Employee specialized in Agriculture/Forestry/Fisheries or equivalent.

Place of Assignment : TSD, PENRO Marinduque Plantilla Item No. : OSEC-DENRB-FORST1-215-1998 Salary/Job/Pay Grade : 11 Monthly Salary : Php 23,877.00 QUALIFICATION Eligibility : RA 1080 (Forester) Education : Bachelors Degree in Forestry Training : None required Work Experience : None required Instructions/Remarks : The Department of Environment and Natural Resources MIMAROPA Region is an Equal Employment Opportunity Principle advocate. This office highly encourages interested and qualified applicants including persons with disability, members of indigenous communities and those from any sexual orientation and gender identities to apply for the published vacant positions. Documents: For those individuals who wish to apply for vacant position in DENR MIMAROPA Region, hereunder are the guidelines: 1. Interested and qualified applicants should signify their interest in writing. Application letter must contain the position/s being applied for including their respective ITEM NUMBER and PLACE OF ASSIGNMENT. In case the applicant stated only the position and there are more than one (1) vacancies, he/she shall only be assessed in one vacancy. 2. Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 24, 2021. a) Fully accomplished and duly subscribed and sworn to Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passportsized picture (CSC Form 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; b) Performance rating in the present position for the last rating period prior to the assessment or screening (if applicable); c) Photocopy of Professional Regulation Commission License and Board Rating/Civil Service Commission Eligibility; d) Photocopy of the Transcript of Records and Diploma; and e) Photocopy of Certificates of Training 3. Applicants, except for the PDS which must be updated and duly accomplished, may opt to use previously submitted documents provided the same is clearly stated in their application/intent letter. 4. The receiving office shall not be responsible for redirecting/rerouting wrongly sent or missent application/s. 5. Application with incomplete documents, not properly filled out and/or unsubscribed and duly sworn PDS, and/or submitted beyond the deadline shall not be entertained. 6. Application letter with complete supporting documents must be addressed to and submitted/sent through courier/emailed to the Regional Office/PENR Office where the vacancy exists: QUALIFIED APPLICANTS are advised to hand in or send through courier/email their application to: MARIA LOURDES G. FERRER, CESO III Regional Executive Director - DENR MIMAROPA Region 1515 L & S Bldg., Roxas Blvd., Ermita, Manila [email protected] APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: RDF Feed, Livestock & Food, Inc.
Job Description: Job Qualifications: Graduate of Doctor of Veterinary Medicine experience in swine farm operations is a plus Directly supervise and coordinate activities of animal husbandry or animal care workers Job Responsibilities: Responsible in strategic and tactical leadership in the farm to ensure its operation remains disease free, performs optimally and operates cost effectively. Management of Farm Logistics and Cost Management of Farm Records and up keeping Management of Farm Personnel Overseeing of Breeding and Farrowing Unit Pig Flow Management Overseeing and implementation of bio-security policies

Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 24, 2021. a) Fully accomplished and duly subscribed and sworn to Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passportsized picture (CSC Form 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; b) Performance rating in the present position for the last rating period prior to the assessment or screening (if applicable); c) Photocopy of Professional Regulation Commission License and Board Rating/Civil Service Commission Eligibility; d) Photocopy of the Transcript of Records and Diploma; and e) Photocopy of Certificates of Training 3. Applicants, except for the PDS which must be updated and duly accomplished, may opt to use previously submitted documents provided the same is clearly stated in their application/intent letter. 4. The receiving office shall not be responsible for redirecting/rerouting wrongly sent or missent application/s. 5. Application with incomplete documents, not properly filled out and/or unsubscribed and duly sworn PDS, and/or submitted beyond the deadline shall not be entertained. 6. Application letter with complete supporting documents must be addressed to and submitted/sent through courier/emailed to the Regional Office/PENR Office where the vacancy exists: QUALIFIED APPLICANTS are advised to hand in or send through courier/email their application to: MARIA LOURDES G. FERRER, CESO III Regional Executive Director - DENR MIMAROPA Region 1515 L & S Bldg., Roxas Blvd., Ermita, Manila [email protected] APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: Toplis Solutions, Inc.
Job Description: Job Summary: The position is responsible in overseeing the wide range of farm operations. Duties and Responsibilities: 1. Recruit, train and supervise farm workers 2. Ensure deadlines are met for farm activities and production 3. Arrange distribution and logistics of farm products 4. Inspect farm building, equipments and ensure routine maintenance is carried out and repairs are made as required 5. Install, maintain and regularly monitor water system 6. Ensure and enforce compliance with government regulations and health safety standard Minimum Job Specifications: Must be willing to be assigned in Sariaya Quezon

Company: ACDI/VOCA
Job Description: Senior Field Technician JOB SUMMARY: The Senior Field Technician (SFT) is responsible for field-level technical assistance, project monitoring, and coordination in the target regions (CAR, Region 1 and Region 2). The SFT is expected to be the local representative of the project and ensure a collaborative work environment that is non-discriminatory and promotes open dialogue on gender-related and culturally sensitive issues. The position requires frequent travel often to remote locations. QUALIFICATIONS: Proven ability to collaborate and work with Local Government Units, various government agencies, government and private extension agents, cooperatives, financial institutions, agribusinesses and other community stakeholders in a multi-sector setting. Proven ability to provide technical assistance and coordinate field-level activities and interventions. Good grasp and understanding of market systems approach for coffee crops. Strong written communication skills, including demonstrated ability to write required documents such as periodic reports in a clear, concise, well-organized manner. Strong organization and planning skills. Basic computer skills (MS Office software) Excellent interpersonal, listening, and verbal communications skills, including the ability to facilitate meetings, training and workshops. Ability to work independently and solve problems. -to be assigned in Bagiuo City EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Agriculture, Rural/Community development, Social Development, Forestry/Environment or other related field. Experienced in training development, and management, field project monitoring and data collection of agricultural projects and supervising staff for at least three (3) years; Background in high value and plantation crops is desirable

Company: Department of Environment and Natural Resources Region II - Government
Job Description: Deadline for accepting applications: May 24, 2021. Only those with Civil Service Eligibility will be processed. Kindly upload your Certificate of Eligibility or PRC License. Place of Assignment: Licenses, Patents and Deeds and Division, Regional Office Plantilla Item No.: OSEC-DENRB-FORST3-48-2014 Salary/Job/Pay Grade: 18 Monthly Salary: Php 43,681.00 QUALIFICATION Eligibility: RA 1080 (Forester) Education: Bachelors Degree in Forestry Training: Eight (8) hours of relevant training Work Experience: Two (2) years of relevant experience Instructions/Remarks: The Department of Environment and Natural Resources MIMAROPA Region is an Equal Employment Opportunity Principle advocate. This office highly encourages interested and qualified applicants including persons with disability, members of indigenous communities and those from any sexual orientation and gender identities to apply for the published vacant positions. For those individuals who wish to apply for vacant position in DENR MIMAROPA Region, hereunder are the guidelines: Interested and qualified applicants should signify their interest in writing. Application letter must contain the position/s being applied for including their respective ITEM NUMBER and PLACE OF ASSIGNMENT. In case the applicant stated only the position and there are more than one (1) vacancies, he/she shall only be assessed in one vacancy. Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 24, 2021. Documents: 1) Fully accomplished and duly subscribed and sworn to Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passport-sized picture (CSC Form 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; 2) Performance rating in the present position for the last rating period prior to the assessment or screening (if applicable); 3) Photocopy of Professional Regulation Commission License and Board Rating/Civil Service Commission Eligibility; 4) Photocopy of the Transcript of Records and Diploma; and 5) Photocopy of Certificates of Training Applicants, except for the PDS which must be updated and duly accomplished, may opt to use previously submitted documents provided the same is clearly stated in their application/intent letter. The receiving office shall not be responsible for redirecting/rerouting wrongly sent or missent application/s. Application with incomplete documents, not properly filled out and/or unsubscribed and duly sworn PDS, and/or submitted beyond the deadline shall not be entertained. Application letter with complete supporting documents must be addressed to and submitted/sent through courier/emailed to the Regional Office/PENR Office where the vacancy exists: APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: INOZA FEED MILLING CORP
Job Description: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree , Professional License (Passed Board/Bar/Professional License Exam), Veterinary or equivalent. Licensed veterinarian is an advantage Will be assigned in Visayas area KEY QUALIFICATIONS Education: Degree in Doctor of Veterinary Medicine, passed licensure examination Experience: at least 1 year experience in food animal production/sales/technical is an advantage Special Skills : has good oral and written skills, computer literate driving skills Job Summary Provides technical support to IFMC clients Duties and Responsibilities: 1) Provides excellent veterinary technical services by giving full support in implementing programs set by the management to achieve better farm performance, management and customer service. 2) Conducts regular visits to key direct farms, dealers/megadealers and distributors in the area. 3) On time submission of weekly itinerary and complete weekly 4) Conducts municipal/private/semi private seminars to prospect clients in the area. 5) Train Technicians to conduct seminars in Bry level and educates them with technical progress report to the TESM. capabilities of IFMC. 6) Participates in company related activities such as Vet Missions, launching etc, 7) Conducts customer service surveys and prospecting, 8) Give prompt reports on customer complaints and recommendations

Company: Bounty Fresh Food Inc.
Job Description: Qualifications: Graduate of Bachelor of Animal Science, BS Agriculture, Agricultural Engineering, Agricultural Extension Education, Agribusiness Management, Agricultural Economics, and/or Bachelor of Agricultural Technology; With effective oral and written communication skills; With good leadership qualities and a team player; Fresh graduates are welcome to apply. Position title will be Stockman (Farm Supervisor) Responsibilities : Attend daily production briefing; Submit transparent and accurate daily production reports, checklists and records; Report on the spot any unusual incident or problem encountered; Rescue and act as counter checker during harvest; Effect, monitor and ensure proper execution of bio-security and company policies; Train subordinates regarding bio-security measures and basic management practices; Complete set tasks assigned by superiors; Perform other duties or functions that will be assigned by the superior.

Place of Assignment : CENRO Baliwag Plantilla Item No. : OSEC-DENRB-FORT1-888-2014 Salary/Job/Pay Grade : 6 Monthly Salary : Php 16,200.00 QUALIFICATION Eligibility : Career Service Sub-professional/First Level Eligibility Education : Completion of two year studies in college Training : None required Work Experience : None required Instructions/Remarks : This Office highly encourages interested and qualified applicants including persons with disability (PWD), member of indigenous communities, regardless of sexual orientation, gender identity expression (SOGIE). Interested and qualified applicants should signify their interest in writing. Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 21, 2021. Documents: 1. Fully accomplished Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passport-sized picture (CS Form No. 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; 2. Performance rating in the last rating period (if applicable); 3. Photocopy of certificate of eligibility/rating/license; and 4. Photocopy of Transcript of Records. By submitting these documents/records, you agree that your information will be used to process your application. Your contact details will be used to communicate with you on the details of the assessment process. Your current and previous employers, references, academic institutions where you obtained your education will also be reached for employment reference check and relevant background information. The recruitment officers, members of the DENR Human Resource Merit Promotion and Selection Board and authorized officials will have access to your submitted documents/records at different stages of the assessment process. QUALIFIED APPLICANTS are advised to hand in or send through courier their application to: PAQUITO T. MORENO, JR., CESO III Regional Executive Director DENR-Region III Diosdado Macapagal Government Center Maimpis, City of San Fernando, Pampanga APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: Department of Environment and Natural Resources Region II - Government
Job Description: Deadline for accepting applications: May 24, 2021. Only those with Civil Service Eligibility will be processed. Kindly upload your Certificate of Eligibility or PRC License. Place of Assignment: CENRO Sablayan, Occidental Mindoro Plantilla Item No.: OSEC-DENRB-FORST1-290-1998 Salary/Job/Pay Grade: 11 Monthly Salary: Php 23,877.00 QUALIFICATION Eligibility: RA 1080 (Forester) Education: Bachelors Degree in Forestry Training: None required Work Experience: None required Instructions/Remarks: The Department of Environment and Natural Resources MIMAROPA Region is an Equal Employment Opportunity Principle advocate. This office highly encourages interested and qualified applicants including persons with disability, members of indigenous communities and those from any sexual orientation and gender identities to apply for the published vacant positions. For those individuals who wish to apply for vacant position in DENR MIMAROPA Region, hereunder are the guidelines: Interested and qualified applicants should signify their interest in writing. Application letter must contain the position/s being applied for including their respective ITEM NUMBER and PLACE OF ASSIGNMENT. In case the applicant stated only the position and there are more than one (1) vacancies, he/she shall only be assessed in one vacancy. Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 24, 2021. Documents: 1) Fully accomplished and duly subscribed and sworn to Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passport-sized picture (CSC Form 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; 2) Performance rating in the present position for the last rating period prior to the assessment or screening (if applicable); 3) Photocopy of Professional Regulation Commission License and Board Rating/Civil Service Commission Eligibility; 4) Photocopy of the Transcript of Records and Diploma; and 5) Photocopy of Certificates of Training Applicants, except for the PDS which must be updated and duly accomplished, may opt to use previously submitted documents provided the same is clearly stated in their application/intent letter. The receiving office shall not be responsible for redirecting/rerouting wrongly sent or missent application/s. Application with incomplete documents, not properly filled out and/or unsubscribed and duly sworn PDS, and/or submitted beyond the deadline shall not be entertained. Application letter with complete supporting documents must be addressed to and submitted/sent through courier/emailed to the Regional Office/PENR Office where the vacancy exists: APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: Magic Melt Food, Inc.
Job Description: plan finances and production to maintain farm progress against budget parameters market the farm's products buy supplies, such as fertiliser and seeds arrange the maintenance and repair of farm buildings, machinery and equipment understand the implications of the weather and make contingency plans ensure that farm activities comply with government regulations apply health and safety standards across the farm estate protect the environment and maintaining biodiversity keep financial records up to date apply for funding - if appropriate. Willing to work in Camotes.

Company: CitiHomes Builders and Development Inc.
Job Description: Job Description: 1. Nursery Management: Potting mix preparation Propagation (Seed sowing, cuttings, marcotting, etc) Closely monitors plants Irrigates/ Fertilize plants Record Keeping 2. Greenhouse and Open field farm operations Land/growing media preparation Transplanting Pruning/Trimming Application/Mixing of nutrients Pest Management Irrigating plants Harvesting 3. Maintaining and propagation of fruit trees Pruning/Trimming Application of fertilizers and pesticides Fruit Bagging Harvesting 4. Composting Gathering of compostable materials Processing/mixing of compost Job Qualifications: At least 1 year experience in farming, gardening or other related industries. Knowledge in vegetable/ high value crops Has basic knowledge in fruit trees & composting. NCII in Organic Agriculture Production or equivalent is an advantage

This office highly encourages interested and qualified applicants including persons with disability, members of indigenous communities and those from any sexual orientation and gender identities to apply for the published vacant positions. For those individuals who wish to apply for vacant position in DENR MIMAROPA Region, hereunder are the guidelines: Interested and qualified applicants should signify their interest in writing. Application letter must contain the position/s being applied for including their respective ITEM NUMBER and PLACE OF ASSIGNMENT. In case the applicant stated only the position and there are more than one (1) vacancies, he/she shall only be assessed in one vacancy. Attach the following documents to the application letter and send to the address below not later than May 24, 2021. Documents: 1) Fully accomplished and duly subscribed and sworn to Personal Data Sheet (PDS) with recent passport-sized picture (CSC Form 212, Revised 2017) which can be downloaded at www.csc.gov.ph; 2) Performance rating in the present position for the last rating period prior to the assessment or screening (if applicable); 3) Photocopy of Professional Regulation Commission License and Board Rating/Civil Service Commission Eligibility; 4) Photocopy of the Transcript of Records and Diploma; and 5) Photocopy of Certificates of Training Applicants, except for the PDS which must be updated and duly accomplished, may opt to use previously submitted documents provided the same is clearly stated in their application/intent letter. The receiving office shall not be responsible for redirecting/rerouting wrongly sent or missent application/s. Application with incomplete documents, not properly filled out and/or unsubscribed and duly sworn PDS, and/or submitted beyond the deadline shall not be entertained. Application letter with complete supporting documents must be addressed to and submitted/sent through courier/emailed to the Regional Office/PENR Office where the vacancy exists: APPLICATIONS WITH INCOMPLETE DOCUMENTS SHALL NOT BE ENTERTAINED.

Company: Lapanday Foods Corporation - Davao
Job Description: Gather daily data on weather related parameters for irrigation use, document, program on daily drainage accomplishment. Prepare programs on improvements for irrigation, and desilting activities for drainage. Supervise irrigation manpower for operation and its related assignments on valve pairings and fundamental jobs needed during operation. Supervise and program available manpower during non-irrigation days and maximize its usage based on program created. Create daily and weekly reports based on standard format as required for irrigation and drainage. Inform immediate supervisor on problems occurred and breakdowns related to operation, and weather related occurrence. Accomplished record and forms based on irrigation and drainage manual as approved by top management. Perform other duties that may be delegated by his superior from time to time. Comply and document farm inspection requirement both for irrigation and drainage.

Prepare programs on improvements for irrigation, and desilting activities for drainage including engineering. Supervise irrigation manpower for operation and its related assignments on valve pairings and fundamental jobs needed during operation. Supervise and program available manpower during non-irrigation days and maximize its usage based on program created. Create daily and weekly reports based on standard format as required for irrigation, drainage and engineering. Inform immediate supervisor on problems occurred and breakdowns related to operation, and weather related occurrence. Accomplished record and forms based on irrigation, drainage, and engineering manual as approved by top management. Perform other duties that may be delegated by his superior from time to time. Comply and document farm inspection requirement both for irrigation, drainage and engineering.

Company: Vanilla Dream
Job Description: Nursery Supervisor Responsibilities: Overseeing and improving the daily functions of the nursery. Opening the nursery in the morning and closing at the end of the business day. training nursery staff. Creating staff work rosters and delegating duties. Ordering nursery stock including soil, stones, fertilizers, shrubs, plants, and trees. Growing plants, to use as stock. Monitoring watering times, soil conditions, and plant positions. Monitoring weather conditions and paying special attention to hot or cold temperatures. Creating robust garden and plant displays. Assisting the nursery staff. Researching for the improvement of Plants Development and Greenhouse. Nursery Supervisor Requirements: Bachelorâ€™s degree in agricultural studies, horticulture, or a similar field. 2+ Yearsâ€™ experience working in nursery field. Excellent communication and managerial skills. Professional and friendly demeanor. Detailed knowledge of plant production, soil, fertilizers, and growing techniques. Experience with training staff. Ability to create work rosters and delegate duties. Excellent interpersonal skills and a passion for Agricultural Industry. Responsible and punctual. Familiarity with Plant Research.

Company: Pharmawide Inc.
Job Description: Job Description: Digital Marketing Handles social media accounts and website management Prepares and executes online marketing campaigns Provides assistance in terms of planning and implementation of marketing activities Providing assistance in terms of planning and logistics to events like seminars and trade shows Assisting in writing and editing sales and marketing materials, which include articles, brochures presentations, website, and collateral including preparing press releases, company newsletter and event announcements. Company: One Sky Jaro
Job Description: The Farm Manager's responsibilities include monitoring staff, crops, and livestock, purchasing supplies, preparing budgets and reports, and ensuring maximum profit. You should be able to maintain professional networks and keep abreast of developments in agricultural science. Accomplishes department objectives by managing staff; planning and evaluating department activities. Maintains staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees. Ensures a safe, secure, and legal work environment. Develops personal growth opportunities. Job Qualifications Previous hands-on farming experience and technical knowledge are as important as academic qualifications, and some employers may appoint you on the basis of your experience alone. Foundation degree in agriculture or a related subject such as: Agricultural engineering Crop management Farm business management Horticulture Land/estate management.

Company: Bounty Agro Ventures Inc.
Job Description: QUALIFICATIONS: Candidate must be a graduate of Veterinary Medicine or equivalent With significant experience in the field of Broiler Production Must be performance oriented and self-motivated With high level of interpersonal skills Can work with minimum supervision Must be willing to spend most of the time in the field and beyond working hours Must know how to drive with valid driver's license RESPONSIBILITIES: Prepare monthly DOC placement schedule and conduct pre-placement visit to ensure that the farm is ready to accept chick placement Attest DOC placements and ensure compliance of growers to standard brooding management practices Make a 4-week rolling harvest forecast, verify weights at the farm before harvest and coordinate harvest schedule with the growers, DP and sales Ensure compliance of Contract Grower to the prescribed AHG programs Monitor and ensure compliance of Contract Grower to management standards in growing chicken Recruit Contract Growers Conduct in-farm seminar regarding management standards Do regular farm visits to check farm depletion, feed consumption, FCR, ALW, and to submit WPR every Monday Forecast feed requirement of farm and coordinate with feed mill regarding feed delivery schedule Do routine necropsy and clinical evaluation to check birds health status and coordinate with AHG

Company: Citimax Group, Inc.
Job Description: POSITION SUMMARY The Bachelor of Science in Forestry (BSF) is a four-year degree program that helps gain a thorough understanding of the forest ecosystem and how it can be properly conserved and managed. The course combines ecology, biology, economics, and social science to manage forest ecosystems and apply knowledge of forestry science to help solve natural resource, environmental, and energy problems. The BS in Forestry program essential skills in the development of management plans and options for forested landscapes and implementing them while maintaining ecosystem integrity. REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor of Science in Forestry (BSF) A minimum of 2 years experience as a Forestry Willing to be assigned to Antipolo City Rizal With experience as Forester for Environmental rehabilitation Quarry operation Community relation

Company: Curran Daly & Associates
Job Description: Our client is one of the worldâ€™s largest food and beverage manufacturers. They are currently seeking to appoint an Agribusiness Development Head who will ensure the direct sourcing of the business by driving practices for sustainable agriculture and responsible sourcing. Responsibilities: â€¢ Responsible for the overall management of the direct sourcing operation of the raw materials in scope, including the physical buying and pricing mechanism when needed, and of the effective usage of all available resources. â€¢ Contribute to price setting by providing to management solid insight on local competition and context. â€¢ Develop and implement the market/region strategies for the direct sourcing of the raw materials required, in line with NestlÃ© policies and business needs. â€¢ Develop new sourcing as per business needs â€¢ Launch and drive all initiatives aiming at developing sustainable agriculture and farmers, thus contributing to sustainable rural development â€¢ Manage the connection with local public institutions for rural development, ministry of agriculture, NGOs, funding partners. Qualifications: â€¢ Post Graduate University degree or equivalent in agriculture, food sciences or equivalent. â€¢ A minimum of 10 yearsâ€™ experience as a line manager in an operation of direct sourcing of agricultural products â€¢ Proven capability to lead a team. The company is an equal opportunity business and encourages diversity in the workplace. An excellent salary will be negotiated to attract the best candidate.

Company: Bounty Agro Ventures Inc.
Job Description: Qualifications: Candidate must be a graduate of Bachelor of Science in/Doctor of Veterinary Medicine Very good in interpersonal skills Effective in communication skills with the ability to teach and train people Performance oriented and self motivated Responsibilities: Prepare monthly DOCâ€™s placement schedule and conduct pre-placement visit to ensure that the farm is ready to accept chick placement. Attest DOCâ€™s placement and ensure compliance of growers to standard brooding management practices. Make four (4) week rolling harvest forecast, verify weights at the farm before harvest and coordinate harvest schedule with the growers, DP and Sales. Ensure compliance of Contract Growers to the prescribe Animal Health Group programs. Monitor and ensure compliance of Contract Grower to management standards in growing chickens. Conduct in-farm seminar regarding management standards. Do regular farm visits to check farm depletion, feed consumption, Feed Conversion Ratio & Average Live Weight and to submit WPR every Monday. Forecast feed requirement of farms & coordinate with feed mill regarding feed delivery schedule. Do routine necropsy and clinical evaluation to check birds health status and coordinate with AHG.

Company: Unahco, Inc.
Job Description: JOB QUALIFICATIONS Graduate of Animal Science major in Animal Nutrition. Preferably licensed in Agriculture With good scholastic record, pleasing personality, good leadership/communication/ people skills. Must be computer literate. Preferably knows how to drive and a holder of a valid driverâ€™s license. Must be willing to be assigned in Visayas and in Mindanao. JOB DESCRIPTION Manages and coordinates all activities to update and ensure effective management of database on nutritional matters; and performs related functions. Performs job functions consistent with the corporate vision and mission statement and core values of the company; Ensures that subordinates perform their respective functions in like manner. Designs / plans the nutritional experiments for continuous product improvement as well as for new product development at the research and development farm(s) in terms of quality and cost considerations; Oversees the implementation of applied research activities. Monitors and reviews the outputs and recommendation emanating from experiments undertaken by the nutritionists and other product development personnel; Implements findings and recommendations in the feed formulation process. Functions as the feed formulation software administrator for UNAHCO feedmills (including toll plants) to manage the data base and ensure that changes are done properly. Establishes task linkages and information exchange with production planning and inventory control, purchasing, manufacturing, and quality assurance personnel on activities affecting feed formulations. Designs/conducts technical and product knowledge training of fieldmen, dealers, customers, farmers and other stakeholders. Assists the sales force in business development and farm penetration activities; assists fieldmen in handling customer feedback and attending to customer complaints. Actively services large farm accounts with their base-mix formulation needs and related technical support. Supervises and controls planned and intervening activities of subordinate employees concerning the performance of their job functions and completion of task assignments in accordance with prescribed standards, in the process providing motivational approaches and training, and disciplining as needed. Submits periodic reports to superiors summarizing activities undertaken and outputs with corresponding analysis and recommendations on enhancing productivity and operational efficiency. Participates in collegial planning for policies, procedures and systems, problem-solving and decision-making, and performance monitoring through participation in standing and ad hoc committees, task forces, and project teams. Performs such other duties and responsibilities related to and/or implied from the above enumeration of duties and responsibilities as may be assigned by superiors from time to time.

Company: Estefania Egg Laying Farm
Job Description: The hirer is still in the process of verification. Copy and paste this link on your browser to know what it means: https://cloud.ph.jobstreetmail.com/PH-JS-CAN-Under-Verification Job Responsibilities: Performs any combinations of following duties concerned with raising poultry for eggs and meat: Removes chicks from shipping cartons and places them in brooder houses. Cleans and fills feeders and water containers. Sprays poultry houses with disinfectants and vaccines. Inspects poultry for diseases and removes weak, ill, and dead poultry from flock. Collects eggs from trap nests, releases hens from nests, and records number of eggs laid by each hen. Packs eggs in cases or cartons; selects, weighs, and crates fryers and pullets; and records totals packed or crated on shipping or storage document. Maintains feeding and breeding reports. Job Qualifications: Knowledge of practical farm operations. Knowledge of the feedings and care of poultry. Knowledge of the kinds and uses of poultry raising supplies and equipment. Ability to operate basic farm tools and equipment such as trucks, tractors, and mowers. Ability to make simple mechanical and carpentry repairs to farm equipment and buildings Ability to understand and follow simple oral and written instructions.

Company: Q2 HR Solutions Inc.
Job Description: Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree , Agriculture/Aquaculture/Forestry, Business Studies/Administration/Management or equivalent. At least 5 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Applicants must be willing to work in Batangas. Preferably CEO/SVP/AVP/VP/Directors specializing in Agriculture/Forestry/Fisheries or equivalent. Full-Time position(s) available. Analyzing existing operations, crops, staff, and financial documents and recommending improvements. Preparing plans and schedules for planting and harvesting and ensuring staff understands expectations. Visiting the different divisions to inspect crops and also perform tests on soil and water. Ensuring seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and other supplies are regularly restocked. Scheduling repairs, maintenance, and replacement of equipment and machinery. Handling the marketing and sale of products produced on the farm like fruit, vegetables, dairy, meat, and grain. Ensuring all staff adheres to health and safety regulations. Collaborating with senior staff to prepare budgets and financial reports. Building professional networks and keeping abreast of developments in agricultural science. Embrace semi-automatic techcnology Managed several greenhouses

Company: Bayer Philippines, Inc.
Job Description: YOUR TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES : Attainment of Annual, Quarterly, Monthly Sales and POGs Budgets for Sales Region Attainment of Monthly, Quarterly and Annual Collection Targets for the Sales Region DSO, Overdue A/Rs and Forecast Accuracy within company standard. Implement the Sales Region's Sales Excellence Initiatives on CRM, Merchandising and other future projects through close coordination with the Channel Management & Commercial Excellence Manager. Implement the Sales Regionâ€™s Channel Product Stewardship plans through close coordination with the Product Stewardship personnel of Crop Science and Channel Partners Coordinates and communicates with Third Party agency Technicians (Sales) to ensure implementation of all company programs in the Distribution Level. Coaching, Feedback & Motivation of other members of the Region Sales group Efficient utilization of Channel Development Fund and harmonization of Programs for the Sales group Monthly reports pertaining to Sales, POGs, Inventory, Pricing, Competition and analyses of the said reports for Sales Area. Analyzes data on RADL, mLiquidation, Dekalb connect and other office tools to get insights on the region and use this data to form new or pivot old programs to ensure its implementing success. Ensure proper post evaluation of all channel and brand initiatives are performed and proper feedback given to program originators given to ensure improvement and adjustments made for next implementations. WHO YOU ARE : College graduate preferably BS Agriculture or any 4-year business related course With earned units in Masters in Business Management or equivalent is an advantage At least 5 years experience in sales and collection At least 5 years experience on Retailers and Distributors Management At least 2 years in Managing a Sales and Collection Team in an area or district level At least 3 years experience as Sales Manager on a District level or equivalent Experience in Marketing is an advantage

Company: M2MJ Human Resources Consulting
Job Description: The hirer is still in the process of verification. Copy and paste this link on your browser to know what it means: https://cloud.ph.jobstreetmail.com/PH-JS-CAN-Under-Verification Job Qualifications: Experience in handling agricultural farm/agro Preferably with experience in raising livestock Licensed Job Responsibilities: Solve agricultural problems concerning power supplies, the efficiency of machinery, the use of structures and facilities, pollution and environmental issues, and the storage and processing of agricultural products. Advises farmers on soil management, breeding animals' living conditions, crop protection, environmental sustainability, disease and harvesting. Conduct research in breeding, physiology, production, yield, and management of crops and agricultural plants or trees, shrubs, and nursery stock, their growth in soils, and control of pests; or study the chemical, physical, biological, and mineralogical composition of soils as they relate to plant or crop growth.

Company: Estefania Egg Laying Farm
Job Description: The hirer is still in the process of verification. Copy and paste this link on your browser to know what it means: https://cloud.ph.jobstreetmail.com/PH-JS-CAN-Under-Verification Job Responsibilities: Performs any combinations of following duties concerned with raising poultry for eggs and meat: Removes chicks from shipping cartons and places them in brooder houses. Cleans and fills feeders and water containers. Sprays poultry houses with disinfectants and vaccines. Inspects poultry for diseases and removes weak, ill, and dead poultry from flock. Collects eggs from trap nests, releases hens from nests, and records number of eggs laid by each hen. Packs eggs in cases or cartons; selects, weighs, and crates fryers and pullets; and records totals packed or crated on shipping or storage document. Maintains feeding and breeding reports. Job Qualifications: Knowledge of practical farm operations. Knowledge of the feedings and care of poultry. Knowledge of the kinds and uses of poultry raising supplies and equipment. Ability to operate basic farm tools and equipment such as trucks, tractors, and mowers. Ability to make simple mechanical and carpentry repairs to farm equipment and buildings Ability to understand and follow simple oral and written instructions.

Company: Australia Farm Innovations (AFI)
Job Description: Qualifications: Â· Bachelorâ€™s degree in surveying, geomatics, geospatial sciences, geophysics, or a related field. Â· At least three (3) yearsâ€™ work experience Â· Experience using hand surveying tools (distance measuring wheels, plumb bobs, levels) and electronic surveying tools (transit levels, GPS equipment) Requirements: Â· Travelling to sites, when necessary. Â· Taking measurements of distances and angles on a property or section of land in order to establish legal boundaries. Â· Employing specialized equipment, including distance measuring wheels, GPS and geographic information system (GIS) devices to measure boundaries and contours. Â· Performing mathematical calculations to determine and confirm surveying measurements. Â· Marking and delineating boundaries and reference points on a property or section of land. Â· Researching and consulting historical maps and surveys, as well as legal documents, relating to the property or section of land they are measuring. Â· Analyzing data using plans, maps, charts, and software such as AutoCAD and GIS programs. Â· Presenting data to clients and preparing reports detailing legal boundaries and other relevant information. Â· Collaborating and working with project managers, construction crews, and government agencies, when necessary.

Job Title: Aquaculturist to be assigned in Isabela
Company: Texicon Agri Ventures Corp.
Job Description: Brief Outline of Duties: Collect and record growth, production, and environment data and perform routing equipment; Maintain fish hatcheries for research purposes Develops and carries out methods for the rearing of fish in hatcheries; Maintain equipment such as the machinery that circulates, aerates and regulates the temperature; May clean ponds and tanks using brushes, chemicals and water and ; Repair screens, retaining walls and fences, and remove debris from water Job Specification: Â· With at least one year experience in related work Â· College graduate in BS Fisheries and other related course Â· Must know how to drive

Job Title: Agri Technician to be assigned in Isabela
Company: Texicon Agri Ventures Corp.
Job Description: Job Description: Keeps management informed by submitting activity and results reports, such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory analyses. Services existing accounts, obtains orders, and establishes new accounts by planning and organizing daily work schedule to call on potential clients. Focuses sales efforts by studying potential volume of dealers. Submits orders by referring to price lists. Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, products, new products, delivery schedules, merchandising techniques, etc. Recommends changes in products, service, and policy by evaluating results and competitive developments. Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; making recommendations to management.

Company: Good Neighbors International Phils. Branch Inc.
Job Description: Project Manager will be based in Municipality San Clemente, Tarlac with some travels to the Community Development Projects. As a Project Manager, he/she will be responsible for planning and implementing the 1-year-project of the Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation sector and Sustainable agriculture of Income Generation Sector. He/she will implement the most appropriate agriculture interventions and climate change adaptation/mitigation interventions based on the local context and need of the target communities. Duties and Responsibilities: Project implementationProvide managerial and technical inputs and guidance required for the implementation of project activities.Ensure the successful and timely implementation of projects and other activities in the assigned area in collaboration with the Department Managers of GNIP, and country director.Provide technical assistance/backstopping in the conduct of Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation sector and Sustainable agriculture of Income generation sector.Provide guidance to Field staff in the implementation of project activities. Monitoring and EvaluationVisit Municipality and barangays for monitoring and participate/organize joint monitoring with project team partners.Leads in the monitoring and evaluation of the community project and ensures that systems are in place to support the equality implementation of community projects.Ensures the development of good practice by supporting the development of strong M&E mechanisms and identify gaps in the standards project implementation.Submit the reports including interim reports and final reports. Networking and PartnershipCoordinate and establish partnership with Government and Non-Government organizations in line with the project.Collaborate with potential partners and relevant stakeholders to support the project. Required Skills and Experience: At least a Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Agriculture, or any other related fields.Must have a heart and strong passion for the poor and sustainable agriculture.Knowledge about climate change adaptation and mitigation, climate smart agriculture techniques, participatory plant breeding, community seed banking, etc.Basic knowledge about Climate Information System (CIS)Has strong five-year experience in dealing with climate change adaptation and mitigation, climate smart agriculture techniques, participatory plant breeding, community seed banking, etc.Knowledge in computer (MS word, excel and power point) is a mustExcellent written and oral communication skills in English and Filipino, including ability to present coherent and convincing analyses to different audiences
